misc.setlist-without-songs: This set does not contain any compositions. Click here to open the editor.
misc.no-setlists: Click here to create Compositions and your first set.

loading.title: Loading...
loading.description: Please wait while the application is being loaded.

intro.welcome-language: Welcome to Rocket Show! Which language do you speak?

editor.select-song: Select an existing composition or create a new one.
editor.select-setlist: Select an existing set or create a new one.
editor.dropzone-message: Drop files here or click to upload
editor.warning-song-changes: This composition contains unsaved changes. Do you really want to proceed?
editor.warning-setlist-changes: This set contains unsaved changes. Do you really want to proceed?
editor.warning-delete-song: Do you really want to delete this composition?
editor.warning-delete-setlist: Do you really want to delete this set?
editor.toast-song-save-error: The composition could not be saved. Please check the log for more details.
editor.toast-setlist-save-error: The set could not be saved. Please check the log for further details.

connection.title: No connection
connection.description: It seems like the device can't be reached. Maybe it's switched off or there is a problem with the network connection.

routing.title: Output
routing.description: Specify, where and how this MIDI file should be played.
routing.remote-devices-hint: You can configure the remote devices in the settings.

settings.warning-reboot: Do you really want to reboot the device?
settings.warning-settings-changes: The settings contain unsaved changes. Do you really want to proceed?
